strapiPost.title: Virtual AccelHERate Forums For Women Today
strapiPost.content:
Are you a woman interested in starting or growing your company? Learn from women excelling in research, innovation, and business today over Zoom. 

  • Live and learn: For the 5th consecutive year, the Arkansas Small Business and Technology Development Center is hosting “accelHERate” for budding entrepreneurs. There will be 2 forums held today at 12p and 2p specifically tailored towards women in the workforce.
  • Passing it on: The forums will include lessons from businesswomen, their learned advice, and topics such as management and growth strategies, startup mistakes and how to avoid them, and key skills for entrepreneurial success. 

For more information and to register for the free event, click HERE.
